verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents, of David.) I was <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
<S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that is <S%H1129>built<s%> As a <S%H5892>city<s%> that is <S%H2266>compact<s%> <S%H9191>together;<s%>

To <S%H8033>which<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up, even the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H3050>Lord<s%> – An <S%H5715>ordinance<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> – To <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
For <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3678>thrones<s%> were <S%H3427>set<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> The <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
<S%H7592>Pray<s%> for the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> "May they <S%H7951>prosper<s%> who <S%H157>love<s%> you.
"May <S%H7965>peace<s%> be within your <S%H2426>walls,<s%> And <S%H7962>prosperity<s%> within your <S%H759>palaces.<s%>"
For the <S%H4616>sake<s%> of my <S%H251>brothers<s%> and my <S%H7453>friends,<s%> I will <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H1696>say,<s%> "May <S%H7965>peace<s%> be within you."
For the <S%H4616>sake<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H9185>good.<s%>
